TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TransactionMessageProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: 允許自訂通道，此通道會使用專屬的異動流程機制，以便將它的異動插入 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 架構中。

span.span: Allows a custom channel, which uses a proprietary transaction flow mechanism, to inject its transaction into the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別可讓針對其通道使用專屬異動流程機制的協力廠商通道開發人員，將他們的異動引入 ServiceModel 架構中。This class allows third-party channel developers who use a proprietary transaction flow mechanism for their channel, to introduce their transaction into the ServiceModel framework. 然後在執行此服務方法時，會使用此交易。The transaction is then used when executing the service method. 這個機制無法與 一起使用。This mechanism cannot be used in conjunction with the .

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Set (System.Transactions.Transaction transaction, System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message);
.method public static hidebysig void Set(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message) cil managed
public: static void Set(System::Transactions::Transaction ^ transaction, System::ServiceModel::Channels::Message ^ message);

param.name: transaction
param.span: 在執行此服務方法時所使用的異動。

span.span: The transaction that will be used when executing the service method.

param.name: message
param.span: 導致呼叫此服務方法的傳入訊息。

span.span: The incoming message that results in calling the service method.

summary.span: 設定在執行此服務方法時所使用的異動。

span.span: Sets the transaction that will be used when executing the service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂傳入通道 (這是服務通道堆疊的一部分) 可以呼叫這個方法，以便將包含 參數的 `transaction` 新增至 `Properties` 參數的 `message` 集合中。A custom incoming channel (which is part of a service’s channel stack) can call this method to add a , containing the `transaction` parameter, to the `Properties` collection of the `message` parameter. 這會提示基礎結構使用傳入的交易來建立 執行個體，然後再呼叫傳入訊息內所要求的服務方法。This prompts the infrastructure to create a instance using the transaction passed in, before calling the service method requested in the incoming message. 此服務方法的 屬性必須設定為 `true`。The service method must have the property set to `true`.

exception.span: 已經在 上設定此屬性。

span.span: The property has already been set on .

exception.span: 需要解封送處理 (Unmarshaling)，而且該作業失敗。

span.span: needs to be unmarshaled, and that operation fails.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Transaction As Transaction
public: property System::Transactions::Transaction ^ Transaction { System::Transactions::Transaction ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得在執行此服務方法時所使用的異動。

span.span: Gets the transaction that will be used when executing the service method.

value.span: 在執行此服務方法時所使用的 執行個體。

span.span: A instance that will be used when executing the service method.
